knowledge.title: Cybersecurity
knowledge.text: I dabble in occasional CTFs, where I enjoy the thrill of bug hunting and problem-solving. Wired into Ghidra sessions, I love diving deep into code, uncovering vulnerabilities, and strengthening digital defenses. Excited to bring this passion to fortify cybersecurity measures.

knowledge.title: Full Stack Development
knowledge.text: I couldn't choose if I wanted to do design UIs or plan application architectures, so I chose full-stack. The flexibility and variety of full stack development is just super addicting to me. Some of the new systems I delved into recently are OAuth and ElasticSearch for the Easy Blog project, providing advanced search and a centralized authentication system.
